requirements.summary: Render platform-specific (icon + label) social/streaming buttons on Home page using existing artistProfile.socials URLs.
acceptanceCriteria: On `/`, each URL in `profile.socials` renders as a visible button with an icon and a readable platform label (e.g., “Spotify”, “Apple Music”, “YouTube”, “Instagram”, “X”, “Facebook”) when the platform can be detected from the URL.
Unknown/unrecognized URLs still render as a button with a generic external-link icon and a non-empty label (e.g., “Link”).
All social/streaming buttons open in a new tab and preserve `rel="noopener noreferrer"`.
No backend changes are required; links continue to be managed via the existing Admin Profile editor social links field.

file_operations.description: Add a shared URL-to-platform helper that detects known social/streaming platforms from a URL and returns a platform label plus a React icon; include a safe fallback (generic external-link icon + non-empty label).

Replace the current generic “Follow” label rendering with platform-specific label + icon derived from each `profile.socials` URL via the shared helper; keep links opening in a new tab with `rel="noopener noreferrer"`.

requirements.summary: Render platform-specific (icon + label) streaming buttons on Music/Releases page using existing release.streamingLinks URLs.
acceptanceCriteria: On `/music`, each URL in `release.streamingLinks` renders as a button with an icon and a platform label when detectable from the URL (e.g., “Spotify”, “Apple Music”, “YouTube Music”, “SoundCloud”, etc.).
If a streaming URL is not recognized, it still renders as a button with a generic external-link icon and a non-empty label (e.g., “Listen”).
All streaming buttons open in a new tab and preserve `rel="noopener noreferrer"`.
Existing admin functionality for adding/removing streaming links remains unchanged and continues to drive what appears on the public page.

file_operations.description: Update streaming link button rendering to use the shared URL-to-platform helper for icon + platform label per `release.streamingLinks` URL (fallback label should be non-empty, e.g., “Listen”); preserve `target="_blank"` and `rel="noopener noreferrer"`.
Extend/adjust platform detection to cover common streaming destinations used on `/music` (e.g., Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube Music, SoundCloud) while keeping a generic fallback behavior.
